nodes.text: Battle in the Cha Raaba system

A battle in the Cha Raaba system between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire took place in 3639 BBY during the Galactic War. Mandalorian warlord Varek Tarn stole the construction plans for the Sovereign Forge, a planned Imperial mining station and shipyard, and attempted to sell them to the Republic at a minefield in the Cha Raaba system. However, the Empire caught up to Tarn and destroyed the shuttle carrying the plans.
Cha Raaba Assault is an Imperial-side space mission in Star Wars: The Old Republic.
